content: a neck snuggie materials one skein of soft worsted weight yarn approx 200 yards or more size 8 circular needle 24 long cast on 100 stitches and join being careful not to twist purl 3 row knit 3 row purl 3 row knit 3 row purl 1 row *k2 together y/o repeat from * to end of row purl 1 row knit 3 row repeat this entire sequence a total of 4 times then purl 3 row knit 3 row purl 2 row and bind off purlwise finish and snuggle in ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 381 salmon brook street granby ct 06035 860 653-9700 www marjisyarncrafts com this pattern was written by marji lafreniere exclusively for marji s yarncrafts this pattern is not for use by others to make items for sale and not to be copied without permission
